sources.title: The Ripper (1986) TOM SAVINI
sources.description:
It's FRIGHT NIGHT @PizzaFLIX 
Stars: Tom Savini, Mona Van Pernis, Tom Schreier
Director: Christopher Lewis

A college professor transforms into a homicidal maniac when he puts on an old antique ring that originally belonged to Jack the Ripper!

üçïAre you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

metadata.Plot: An old antique ring turns a college professor into a homicidal maniac when he puts it on. The ring originaly belonged to Jack the Ripper, and the Ripper's spirit possesses whoever wears it.
metadata.Actors: Tom Schreier, Mona Van Pernis, Wade Tower, Tom Savini
